t: Inside Natura & Co's alternative vision for the Amazon | Trellis
s: July 12, 2021 - Natura, founded some 50 years ago in Sao Paolo, has long purported to be a leader in sustainable beauty, and its Ekos brand in particular boasts a menu of ingredients sourced from the Amazon, such as acai berries, ucuuba seeds and murumuru butter. But the firm has ballooned in size over the¬†...

t: Natura commits to sourcing sustainably from Amazon | Guardian sustainable business | The Guardian
s: March 18, 2013 - Natura hopes to change that. The Brazilian cosmetics company, recently ranked the second most sustainable company on the planet by Canadian research firm group Corporate Knights, has pledged to buy 30% of its raw ingredients from sustainable sources in the Amazon.

t: Cosmetics maker Natura urges Brazil to protect Amazon after fires hit suppliers | Reuters
s: December 2, 2019 - Natura, which makes many cosmetics using natural additives from the Amazon, convened meetings to improve dialogue between government officials, NGOs and local communities as deforestation in Brazil's Amazon region hit an 11-year high this year.

t: Beauty brand Natura taps into bioelectric signals of Amazon trees for its first sound logo
s: November 6, 2024 - Brazilian beauty giant Natura has unveiled its first-ever sonic identity, created by capturing and transforming the electrical pulses of Amazon rainforest trees into melody. Developed in partnership with Africa Creative and sound design studio Soundthinkers, the initiative leverages proprietary¬†...

t: IFC invests in Natura's financial mechanism to strengthen socio-biodiversity economy in the Amazon
s: October 25, 2024 - Founded in 1969, Natura is a Brazilian multinational hygiene and cosmetics company. With 2 million consultants in Latin America, Natura leads the direct selling sector in Brazil. It is a part of Natura &Co, the result of the combination between the Avon and Natura brands.

t: IDB Invest Supports Natura in a Sustainability-Linked Bond Focused on Bio-Ingredients from the Amazon Region | IDB Invest
s: July 9, 2024 - Natura Cosm√©ticos S.A. received investments from IDB Invest of R$200 million. The operation follows the announcement of Natura's 13th debenture issuance in the format of sustainability-linked bonds (SLBs) for R$1.32 billion.
